about_the_game:
Game Introduction

Graduation Life Simulator "is a simple and casual 2D simulation business development game. Here, you will transform into a newly graduated college student, bringing dreams and challenges to the big city, striving to accumulate wealth from scratch, with the ultimate goal of earning 10 million yuan! However, leaving the comfort zone of university, you will face multiple pressures such as economic, employment, and career development, but at the same time, you will also experience the "freedom" of independent living!

Gameplay

In the Graduation Life Simulator, players can engage in a variety of rich activities:

Career: Choosing to work in the talent market to earn money, while also improving one's skills through training, can lead to higher income.

Lifestyle: In addition to busy work, enjoy the delicious snacks in the snack street at night, or take time to exercise in the park to maintain health.

Social interaction: Participate in various random events and side quests, expand interpersonal relationships, and enhance career development opportunities.

Skill enhancement: Continuously improve personal abilities and enhance competitiveness through fitness, reading, and participating in training.

Game Features

Diverse Scenes: Explore up to 25 unique scenes, each with its own unique function and meaning.

Immersive music: Each scene is equipped with independent background music, allowing you to experience the game atmosphere more deeply.

Growth System: Experience the growth and progress of a character through various means such as equipment, experience points, attributes, and passive skills.

Reasonable numerical design: A carefully optimized numerical system ensures a balanced gaming experience and avoids numerical collapse.

Free ending

The game does not have a fixed ending, and players can experience multiple lifestyles based on their own choices and efforts. When you successfully achieve your goals, corresponding rewards and achievements will be unlocked. Your story is written by you!

Take immediate action

If you are looking forward to this game, please add it to your wishlist. Your support will be my constant driving force, helping me create a more exciting gaming world! Thank you.

name: 毕业生活模拟器 Graduation Life Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
